symptoms: Child has fever for 2 days and cough
next_steps: ["Give paracetamol for fever (as per weight)", "Ensure adequate fluid intake", "Monitor temperature every 4 hours", "Refer to PHC if fever persists beyond 3 days"]
danger_signs: ["High fever above 103\u00b0F that doesn't respond to medicine", "Difficulty breathing or chest pain", "Severe headache with stiff neck", "Rash that doesn't fade when pressed"]
patient_instructions: Give the patient plenty of water and rest. Use a wet cloth on forehead to cool down. Give fever medicine as directed. If fever stays high for more than 3 days, go to the health center.
